queries.clientAvails: select timestamp as x, round(sum(status)*100/count(status)) as y0, group_concat(case when status=0 then system end) as info0 from logs where timestamp > $from and timestamp < $to group by round(strftime('%s',timestamp)/$timeStep)
queries.clientAvailsBanner: select cast(sum(status) as float)*100/count(status) as percent from logs where timestamp > $from and timestamp < $to
queries.ClusterErrRate: select 100-(cast(sum(status) as float)*100/count(status)) as percent from logs where timestamp > $from and timestamp < $to
queries.clientAvailsPie: select sum(status) as y1, count(status) - sum(status) as y0, group_concat(case when status=0 then system end) as y0_info, $none as y1_info from logs where timestamp > $from and timestamp < $to ORDER BY datetime(timestamp) DESC
queries.JSONGrowthCalc: select json_extract(additional_status, $nodeID) AS data_output from logs where logid=$logID AND json_valid(additional_status) is true ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 20
queries.JSONDataCalc: select json_extract(additional_status, $nodeID) AS raw_data from logs where logid=$logID AND json_valid(additional_status) is true ORDER BY datetime(timestamp) DESC LIMIT 1
queries.JSONMAXDataCalc: select additional_status AS raw_data from logs where logid=$logID AND json_valid(additional_status) is true ORDER BY datetime(timestamp) DESC LIMIT 1
queries.JSONMAXDataCalc_Health: select additional_status AS raw_data from logs where logid IN ($logID_1,$logID_2,$logID_3) AND json_valid(additional_status) is true ORDER BY datetime(timestamp) DESC LIMIT 3
queries.CPUDataCalc: select 100-(json_extract(additional_status, $nodeID)) AS raw_data from logs where logid=$logID AND json_valid(additional_status) is true ORDER BY datetime(timestamp) DESC LIMIT 1
queries.SQLFilter: select additional_status AS additional_status, timestamp as timestamp from logs where logid=$logID and timestamp > $from AND json_valid(additional_status) is true order by timestamp desc
queries.CurrentSQLFilter: select additional_status AS additional_status, timestamp as timestamp from logs where logid=$logID AND json_valid(additional_status) is true order by timestamp desc limit 1
queries.RawSQLData: select additional_status AS additional_status from logs where logid=$logID AND json_valid(additional_status) is true order by timestamp desc limit 1
